aboutme.title: about me
aboutme.content: I am a CSE undergrad at Galgotias, Uttar Pradesh, batch of 2024.I like to work with TS, JS and it's various frameworks. Python is my 2nd language of choice.I have built many projects on AI-ML.This website shows my contact details, past experience along with some of the projects that I have worked on.

items: Developed Production Ready APIs and Admin Panels
Service handles thousands of live users
Worked with Selenium, AWS, PostgreSQL, NodeJS
Developed RESTful APIs for Industrial scale ML Pipeline
Automated cleaning & transormation of raw data
Visualized change in accuracy of data after transformation on standard models
Deployed RESTful APIs on the android ecosystem
Learned skills like time management and being a team player

items.content: A live web-app that automates ESG scoring and data exctraction using python backend. A great way to visualize your data according to your needs.
A chrome extension that allows you to check for deepfake while surfing over video channels. A convolutional neural network is trained to detect deepfakes. It is used Modzy Api
A Jupyter Notebook that gets the most recent news articles about a company and applies sentiment analysis to mine for an ESG score when given a ticker.
A Jupiter Notebook that uses Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) to predict the stock prices of Google.
Worked on ISRO Flood detection challenge, a web application which maps the major flood prone regions of India and finds places near them using the MapBox, Places, and Directions API.
Social Distancing Patch using Arduino. It uses Twilio API to alert user of quarantined location and potential infected visits according to arogya setu data.
